job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Clinpharma Consulting Global Group LLC. is a ICC firm based in Delaware and New Jersey that provides unparalleled consulting services.We are currently looking for 5 consultant trainees to join our dynamic team. Major in Computer Science; Electrical Engineering; Computer Engineering; Information system; Statistics or knows JAVA will be a great fit for the role.


We happily sponsor OPT; OPT extension and H-1B. Interested candidate please send your resume to betty@gmailsas.com




Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related field
